readable.title: 2474918824_88660c7757
readable.content: A guy tries to climb a stone cliff while his friend helps him . A man in a red shirt climbs a rock while another man stands behind to help him . A man in a red shirt is learning how to climb a cliff . A man in brown is helping a man in red climb a rock . A man wearing a brown sweatshirt helps a man in red climb a rock .
